noteswrds <- noteswrds[sample(1:nrow(noteswrds)),]

reactable(
  noteswrds,
  columns = list(
    Words = colDef(style= list(background = '#dee7e7'),
      cell = function(value, index) {
        Reading <- noteswrds$Reading[index]
        Reading <- if (!is.na(Reading)) Reading else ""
        Meaning <- noteswrds$Meaning[index]
        Meaning <- if (!is.na(Meaning)) Meaning else ""
        tagList(
          div(style = list(fontSize = 40, fontWeight = 600, fontFamily = 'Open Sans', color = '#0F2040'), value),
          # div(style = list(fontSize = 10, fontWeight = 600, fontFamily = 'Open Sans', color = '#026450'), Reading),

        )
      },
      align = "center"
    ),
    Reading = colDef(show = FALSE),
    Meaning = colDef(show = FALSE)
  ),
  rowClass = "my-row",
  class = "my-tbl",
  defaultPageSize = 1,
  theme = reactableTheme(
    backgroundColor = "#f1f5f3",
    borderColor = "#f1f5f3",
    selectStyle = list(backgroundColor = "#dee7e7"),
    paginationStyle = list(borderColor = "#061126"),
